menu.name: Chicken Biryani
menu.description: Aromatic basmati rice with marinated chicken and spices, served with raita.

menu.name: Mutton Biryani
menu.description: Tender mutton cooked with fragrant rice and flavorful spices, accompanied by raita.

menu.name: Vegetable Biryani
menu.description: A spicy and flavorful rice dish with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and spicy pepperoni slices.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin crust.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menu.description: A delicious pizza with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy egg sauce, pancetta, and parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
menu.description: Fettuccine pasta in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce, topped with parmesan.

menu.name: Penne Arrabbiata
menu.description: Penne pasta in a spicy tomato sauce with garlic, chili, and herbs.

menu.name: Garlic Bread
menu.description: Crispy bread slices topped with garlic butter and herbs.

menu.name: Masala Chai
menu.description: Traditional Indian tea brewed with spices like cardamom, ginger, and cinnamon.

menu.name: Green Tea
menu.description: A refreshing and light tea made from steamed green tea leaves.

menu.name: Iced Tea
menu.description: Chilled black tea served with lemon slices and ice cubes.
